lead_paragraph: Braden Holtby only needed to make 15 saves for a shutout on a drab evening of relatively little action, so even he was willing to acknowledge what plenty of others were thinking.
snippet: Braden Holtby only needed to make 15 saves for a shutout on a drab evening of relatively little action, so even he was willing to acknowledge what plenty of others were thinking....

headline.main: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
headline.print_headline: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
